DOC.brief_summary: To compare nutritional effect blood glucose two commercially available enteral diet overweight obese patient Intensive Care Unit .
DOC.brief_title: The DIVINE Study : DIetary Management Glucose VarIability iN thE ICU
DOC.criteria: New admit ICU expect remain ICU 7 day Ventilator dependent admission Requiring tube feed enteral nutrition ( EN ) 7 day Expected receive 50 % caloric need within 72 hour Body Mass Index 2645 Trauma patient Major surgery past 30 day plan next 7 day Diabetes mellitus ( DM ) type 1 Admitted diagnosis diabetic ketoacidosis primary diagnosis History insulin require DM prior admission hospital Pregnant lactate Nonfunctioning GI tract Use parenteral nutrition past 30 day Admitted burn > 20 % body surface area Traumatic brain injury Hemodynamic instability prevents delivery EN > 24hr Unable access GI tract feed via tube , unable receive EN Other contraindication tube feed Any condition would allow patient complete study protocol Use enteral formula enrollment change investigational product
